Dialogue.0: You spot a figure along the edge of the cliffside, seated on a bright red square of fabric...
Dialogue.1: As you approach, you realize it's Reinâ€”and that she appears to be in the middle of a picnic!
Dialogue.2: But... she also appears to be alone. Which, as far you know, is not how picnics are usually supposed to go.
Dialogue.3: "Oh-- hello, {name}! Fancy seeing you all the way up here..."
Dialogue.4: "Come, take a seat! I have far more food that I could possibly hope to finish on my own."
Dialogue.5: Could it be that she set all of this up... hoping you'd walk by and join her?
